name: Curvilinear Mid-Century Sconce
description: With shades that tilt and arms that swing from side to side, our Curvilinear Sconce is a smart choice for your bedside, reading nook or study space. Even better, its plug-in design means no hardwiring required. The shell-shaped shades and sculptural body is our modern take on classic mid-century style. Double Dimensions 10 "wx 47.2" dx 28 "h. Product webpage Polys: 101,195 Verts: 101,438 Long Dimensions 38 "wx 10" dx 16.5 "h. Product webpage Polys: 51,765 Verts: 51,916 Short Dimensions 10 "wx 19" dx 7.8 "h.
